The applicable rate of interest shall be as mentioned in Clause 23.6.4 of Article 23, which states: t"Interest rate shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1.25%". The footnote specifies that "the Authority shall declare the list  of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks on Ist September every Thlenda vear based on the Balance Sheet size aS declared in their Annual reports The 1 year Marginal Cost of funds based Lending Rate (MCLR) of the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks shall be taken at the start of every Quarter. 2 Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks along with their one year MCLR (rate of interest), applicable as on Ist October, 2021. 3 The rates for 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks are as below: Sr .
